rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional Kerala-style wooden beams and exposed brick walls. Incorporates Vastu principles by ensuring south-eastern light flow.
Open dining space adjacent to the living room, designed to encourage social interaction and natural ventilation.
Well-equipped kitchen with traditional Kerala style layout. Ensures efficient workflow with placement considering Vastu for fire element balance.
Designated study area with a view of the garden, optimized for natural light from the east to promote concentration.
Guest bathroom with essential amenities and privacy, aligned for optimal water flow.
Utility area that includes storage space, laundry, and a small pantry. Placed per local building norms and Vastu guidelines to avoid clutter in active areas.

openings.description: Main entry from the north, ensuring balanced energy flow as per Vastu.
Large windows providing a view of the garden and enhancing natural light.
Service entry for staff and utility movement, positioned according to local norms on a west-facing plot.
